title: You Are My Sunshine
summary: "You Are My Sunshine" is a song copyrighted and published by Jimmie Davis and Charles Mitchell[4][5] in 1940. According to BMI, it has been recorded by more than 350 artists, and translated into 30 languages.[6] In 1977, the Louisiana State Legislature decreed that "You Are My Sunshine" would be a  state song, to honor two-time governor Jimmie Davis.[7]
